Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two bands in added white; exterior: painted decoration consisting of sphinx (part of hair spiral and wing with added red dab) to left.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 289, no. 868, pl. 119, no. 868)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1021) (phase 2)
